item.content:encoded:
As the Lucidia community continues to grow and thrive, we’re always looking for ways to bring in more players and make our connections with them stronger. With this in mind, we’re excited to announce the Lucidia Referral Program, which is meant to encourage and reward our loyal players for their dedication to the game and for telling other people about how much they love Lucidia.

 

Participants in the Lucidia Referral Program have a unique chance to earn 5% of all the $LUCID their referrals spend in the game over the course of their lifetime. This not only encourages players to tell their friends about Lucidia, but also gives them a way to make money without doing anything.

 

Here’s how the referral program works:

 

Players who are already part of the Lucidia community will get a unique link they can share with friends, family, and others who want to join.

If a new player signs up using the referral link, the existing player will be credited with the referral.

The player who brings in new players will get 5% of all the $LUCID the new players spend in the game over their lifetime.

The goal of this referral program is to create a system where players are rewarded for being loyal and dedicated to the game, and Lucidia’s user base grows. It gives people who are really into the game a good reason to tell their friends about it, which makes the community stronger and more diverse.

 

We think that this program not only helps people grow, but also makes our community stronger. We’re sure that as more people join us through the referral program, the overall game experience will get better and the world of Lucidia will keep changing.

 

So, get ready, share your unique referral link, and help us make the Lucidia community even more active and fun!

item.content:encoded:
The Lucidia metaverse is not just a place for immersive games and social experiences; it is also a thriving digital economy where users can do business and trade digital assets. The Lucidia Marketplace is one of the most important parts of the metaverse. It serves both large-scale players and small-scale creators and gives users a lot of ways to make money from their virtual experiences.

 

Tokenization of assets and easy trading

The tokenization of all in-game assets is at the heart of the Lucidia Marketplace. This lets users buy, sell, and trade digital items like clothes, accessories, artwork, and in-game items. The marketplace has a smooth and easy-to-use interface that makes it easy for users to find the assets they want and make transactions using the platform’s native token, $LUCID.

 

Open to everyone, from well-known brands to small-time creators

The Lucidia Marketplace is made to be open to everyone, so both big brands and small creators can show off and sell their digital assets there. The thriving virtual economy is made up of fashion houses, global brands like Coca-Cola, and creative people. This makes it easier for people to find unique and different things, and it also encourages creative expression and business in the metaverse.

 

Using business to improve the gaming experience

The Lucidia Marketplace makes the gaming experience much better by giving users access to a wide range of assets and business opportunities. Users can change how their avatars look, get rare in-game items, and access special content, all while helping the virtual economy as a whole.

 

A place to trade that is safe and open

The Lucidia Marketplace uses blockchain technology to make sure that transactions are safe and easy to understand. This builds trust among users and gives the digital economy a strong base on which to grow. Also, smart contracts automatically make it possible to transfer assets and settle payments, which speeds up the trading process.

item.content:encoded:
In the Lucidia ecosystem, the Lucid token ($LUCID) is the primary form of cash and utility token. The purpose of $LUCID, a token with a total quantity of 1 billion coins, is to serve as a medium of exchange and a means of exchange inside the metaverse.

 

Features essential to the $LUCID token:

 

Token Generation Event (TGE) Token Distribution: Upon the Token Generation Event (TGE), $LUCID tokens will be distributed amongst presale, public Initial DEX Offerings (IDOs), and liquidity.

 

Allocation of Tokens: Thirteen percent of all tokens are set aside as a reserve or are burned if necessary to keep the value of $LUCID stable when new tokens enter the market. There is a one-year cliff built into this allotment.

 

Users of the Lucidia platform will have access to nine percent of the platform’s total $LUCID supply as in-game prizes and for helping shape the platform’s future. In addition to the 4% of $LUCID that will be made available to the public through IDOs, staked tokens will also earn rewards.

 

The Lucidia team is dedicated to fine-tuning $LUCID’s tokenomics until they are optimal for the platform’s users. They won’t stop tweaking the system until they’ve achieved maximum reliability and efficiency.

 

To sum up, the $LUCID token is poised to become an integral part of the Lucidia metaverse, bringing value and utility to the platform’s user base. If you’re interested in the future of gaming and virtual reality, the $LUCID token pre-sale is the best cryptocurrency investment opportunity of 2023.
